example.eg: He has worked at the factory since 1999.
example.egtrans: 他自 1999 年以来一直在这家工厂工作。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迄今, 以来, 自从…以来

example.eg: We got in a big argument.  I haven't called her since.
example.egtrans: 我们大吵了一场。从那以后我再没有给她打过电话。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 后来, 从那以后, 其后

example.eg: He hasn't been seen since he made that terrible scene.
example.egtrans: 自他做了那件可怕的事后，就没人见到过他。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自…以来, 自…以后, 从…的时候起

example.eg: I'll cook dinner, since you're so busy.
example.egtrans: 因为看你这么忙，所以我来做晚饭。

example.eg: Ever since she met Dave, she's given up on her other friends.
example.egtrans: 自从她遇见了戴夫，就开始疏远自己的朋友。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自从, 自...以后, 从...起

example.eg: His wife died a couple of years ago, and he's been depressed ever since.
example.egtrans: 他妻子几年前去世了，自那以后他就一直很抑郁。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从那时起, 自那以后

dsense.name: it's been ages since
dsense.guideword: (it's been a very long time since)

example.eg: It's been ages since we all sat down together.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从…以来已经过了很久了

example.eg: I've long since retired; I haven't worked for years.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 很久以来, 很久以前

example.eg: The last time I saw Lou was two years ago; she's grown so much since then!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 从那时起, 什么时候开始, 何时起

example.eg: Olivia joined the company two years ago, since when she has instigated several major changes.
